question: Which quarter demonstrates the strongest student performance based on the stacked area chart?

options.A: Q4 shows the strongest performance with the highest total area.
options.B: Q1 shows the strongest performance with balanced metrics.
options.C: The chart cannot determine overall performance because it combines unrelated student metrics.
options.D: Q3 shows the strongest performance with the highest library book count.

explanation: The chart stacks unrelated student metrics (test score, absence days, library books) into a cumulative area. These metrics cannot be meaningfully combined to assess overall performance. Only individual metric analysis is valid.
